attributes.action: Reject a proposal to build a Mosque in London Docklands with taxpayers money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I strongly object to this proposal it is totally outrageous to waste taxpayers money in this manner.  If Muslims want this Mosque they should find the money in a different way.  I would like to see taxpayers money used for a more worthwhile project.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
